France wants to rebuild Iraq... 
 
 Germany says they love the US... 
 
 Russia's just being quiet... 
 
 Let me tell you all... I hope we never forget what these countries did. Now they want to be our friends again... they're sorry. Too bad. I don't think we should let these guys have contracts in Iraq... I don't think the Iraqis will either. Germany supplied a lot of arms and WMD equipment to Iraq, and France, Russia, and China have big oil deals and are big trading partners. They've been funding Saddam. 
 
 Too late to be sorry... you just want to make more money in Iraq and American boycotts to end. I hope it doesn't happen.

Now broker, they can have some contracts. After the US gets all the good ones that is :). I keep thinking Iraq's mobil weapons labs are going to have a 'Made In France' tag on them...
 
 ah well, I dont think ill ever stop boycotting france. I wont hear them appologize as now I mentaly chcange everything the frecnh say into bla. :p

and France, Russia, and China have big oil deals and are big trading partners.
 
 
 We get oil from them too. Not a large portion of our imports, but still.

True, but we never violated the trade embargo like France, Russia, Germany, and China did. In fact, France did have a hand in their mobile lab facilities, as they illegally sent them refridgerated trucks, Renault I do believe.
Yes, we do, but we don't have billions in huge oil contracts. France has contracts for 23% of all the oil. 23%!

France wont have anything after we get done. The new regimine in Iraq will serve the people of Iraq, not the Nations who served thier dictator. Sadam will go, there is no hope for him now. We will make the world safe from terrorism, one way or the other. We do not need to wait until more innocent Americans die before we act. That is like trying to get out of your car after the train has already hit it, it is too late once we have another 9/11. We need to act before the threat arrives, not when death has already come and gone.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Ugh... Now They Realize
